title: NexusFlavor
author: NexusFlavor
content: I understand the world is Ruling Famlies of elites who earned their wealth through Wars and Banking and that their power has translated Full-Force into the Digital Crypto space!It's not any longer the small niche community anymore, but rather a mix of interests and mostly criminal Banker interests as SBF/FTX and DCG/Genesis have proven...........Where does the REAL technology reside for Blockchain?Well Signature Chains the most overlooked aspect of Crypto while everyone is blaming each other for their lost crypto and their lack of understanding the scam before they put money into it!  HEY it's got a phone app let me put all my money into it even though I know nothing about taking custody of the crypto keys!Oh hey it's so easy a cave-man can do it!  and not lose his crypto!  Binance killing all the liquidity due to the Mafia trolls who bragged about getting Nexus de-listed from Binance ect.........I understand there is now no where to really acquire any NXS/Nexus as if I already wasn't invested I would not either, as Binance liquidity was one of the main reasons I invested into NXS/Nexus a few years ago!Although, it's hard and much more difficult due to the Chinese Mafia De-listing of Nexus it's still the best way to store a couple thousand dollars of Crypto and forget about trading it!https://www.nexus.iohttps://miningpoolstats.stream/nexushttps://github.com/NexusoftIs still the ONLY game in Town!
